title: If the use of the site is for the purpose, which in the opinion of the Authority will be a source of
clause_text: If the use of the site is for the purpose, which in the opinion of the Authority will be a source of annoyance to the health and comfort of the inhabitants of the neighbourhood;
section: Site not Eligible for Construction of Building
